name: Magical Musketeer Calamity
text: You can activate "Magibullet" Spells/Traps from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap is activated in the same column as this card: You can target 1 "Magibullet" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter Calamity" once per turn.
